examples: Please write to me every week

definitions.text: have (one's written work) issued for publication
examples: How many books did Georges Simenon write?
She published 25 books during her long career
He wrote that he would be coming soon

definitions.text: mark or trace on a surface
examples: The artist wrote Chinese characters on a big piece of white paper
Russian is written with the Cyrillic alphabet
boot-up instructions are written on the hard disk

definitions.text: write or name the letters that comprise the conventionally accepted form of (a word or part of a word)
examples: He spelled the word wrong in this letter

definitions.text: create code, write a computer program
examples: She writes code faster than anybody else
